channel.title: Npcs hit harder
channel.description: Hey, ive been working on this for 3 days now and I CANNOT find how you make npcs hit harder!Ive checked Google, google, and even silabsoft. cant find any tuts on how to do this. I just made a other help thread here for helping with items and they responded in like 30 seconds. I like this community way better then google now . But yea, how do i make my bosses hit hard with mele/range/mage, i just want melee though. Thanks

item.title: Npcs hit harder
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

It should be in the npcHandler in most sources. There will be an algorithm which calculates hits for npcs, and i’m pretty sure on a blank base this just calculates something to do with their combat level and hitpoints, but i’m not 100% on that. Also, more advanced sources will have this edited, so it includes player defence, and armouer bonuses. But basically, it IS inside npcHandler you just need to find it.

Also, there may be an extra variable involved for you to edit how hard they can hit (excluding defence from player) which is also in there somewhere, but i haven’t played around with NPCs for a long time, so i’m not sure on that one either.

Hope you find out soon, GL.

Read full topic

item.title: Npcs hit harder
item.dc:creator: @Ranqe_Skill Ranqe Skill
item.description:
@Ranqe_Skill wrote:

West, im positive you can, and noobspure, i know its in there but the only things i see is lots of “goodDistance” and if it mages or ranges but i CANNOT find hits melee or hits hard or crap

Read full topic

item.title: Npcs hit harder
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

I don’t think there is a way to change their damage. (I may be wrong, don’t hate me if I am.)
I only know how to adjust their hitpoints.
